description: This is a shoot from the tail end of last autumn and as we started the film it was pretty warm, that hazy cloud and still air making it seem even warmer and the lads are well hot! Straight guys, this one wants locking up! Ah, now there is a theme for next time!
title: Straight Young Pup Chris Little Dives in for His First Man Kiss - How Hot... and Wet!
